author: Megan Davies
title: Kevin Hart has some words of wisdom for Amy Schumer ahead of her SNL hosting debut - Showbiz
text: As Amy Schumer prepares to make her Saturday Night Live hosting debut, it's nice to know that she can rely on her friends for some heartwarming messages of encouragement. Maybe.Earlier today (October 10), the actress and comedian shared a text message from fellow comedian Kevin Hart on Twitter, in which he offered some rather unique words of wisdom.Hostile text @KevinHart4real #snl pic.twitter.com/DUrAbmwWju— Amy Schumer (@amyschumer) October 10, 2015"Hey I know you're hosting SNL tonight," the text began. "If you get nervous during your monologue just tell the audience that you know me. I promise it will help."Or you can FaceTime me but I probably wouldn't be able to pick up because I'm busy doing stuff. Just spit balling here.... I'm trying to help."You know what fuck it ... You will be fine ... I hope... God Bless... K Hart Out." © NBC UniversalKevin Hart in SNL promo Schumer later assured fans with a follow-up tweet that Hart was joking and shared his later reply that hinted he may have gotten his dates mixed up, and meant to send that text to last week's host Miley Cyrus.Hart's message wasn't the only thing Schumer shared with fans ahead of her SNL appearance though, as the star also posted an adorable baby picture of herself earlier in the day with the caption: "Excuse me, Mum and Dad, I am hosting Saturday Night Live tonight."Excuse me, Mum and Dad, I am hosting Saturday Night Live tonight pic.twitter.com/6uv2ZaHb1m— Amy Schumer (@amyschumer) October 10, 2015Joining Amy Schumer on SNL will be musical guest The Weeknd for both stars' first-ever appearances on the sketch show.Saturday Night Live airs at 11.30pm ET on NBC.
